author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: yoddha: OMG: Dev ready to settle down with his girlfriend! | Bengali Movie News
text:
So, remember, when last year we told you about the new girl in Dev 's life? From the looks of it, the girl is all set to become Dev's better half. Or so claims Dev's one-time close associates.
Rukmini Maitra , a city-based model has, it seems, successfully established her rule over Tollywood's hunkiest heartthrob Dev. And, little birdie tells us, Dev is so smitten by this leggy-lady that he is looking forward to settling down. Raima Sen , who was rumoured to be in a relationship with Dev a long time ago, revealed to a new daily that Dev has finally gotten engaged. "I have heard from a very reliable source, Dev is engaged. I hope, Dev doesnt get angry with me, now that I have spilled the beans," she was Quote: d as saying.
Also Read: Who is the new girl in Dev's life?
The model, who did her college from Loreto and has an MBA degree too, seen alongside Dev on various occasions right from last year. Off late, she has also been making frequent appearances at Tollywood's filmy parties. In fact, she was even present at the outdoor shoot schedules of Rfaj Chakrabarty's Joddha, which stars Dev and Mimi Chakraborty. Here's the proof:
Rukmini in neon green by Dev's side. Pictures tweeted by Raj Chakrabarty
Dev, however, has brushed aside all such reports as nonsense.
